name: Lessonbee
description: Lessonbee® promotes safe and healthy schools via personalized online health education for K-12 students. They raised 1.2M in Seed funding in 2022.

name: Sworkit
description: Sworkit is a leading personalized exercise and fitness mobile app, making improving health simple. The company has raised $3M+ to date, and was even offered funding on Shark Tank.

name: doc-doc
description: doc-doc is a telemedicine mobile app focused on connecting patients directly with medical specialists. They have raised USD $2M+ in seed funding from investors including Cardo Health and 500 Global.
